### Checklist

- [ ] Entry is in alphabetical order within its category.
- [ ] URL is valid and points to the correct resource.
- [ ] Description starts with a capital letter and ends with a period.
- [ ] Description is ≤20 words and avoids promotional language.
- [ ] Tool is actively maintained (last commit within 6 months).
- [ ] Open-source: ≥50 GitHub stars OR from a recognized organization.
- [ ] I verified this entry from at least 2 independent sources.
- [ ] No duplicate — this entry does not already exist in the list.
- [ ] I ran `npx awesome-lint` and there are no errors.
